columns.repair_ID: A unique identifier for each repair record in the database.
columns.name: The designation or name of the machine associated with the repair.
columns.Launch_Date: The date on which the machine was launched or became operational.
columns.Notes: Additional information or observations related to the repair, including success or failure details.

repair.table_description: The repair table stores information about various machine repairs, including unique identifiers, machine names, launch dates, and notes about repair outcomes.

columns.Machine_ID: A unique identifier for each machine in the database.
columns.Making_Year: The year in which the machine was manufactured.
columns.Class: The displacement category of the machine, commonly used in racing classifications.
columns.Team: The name of the racing team associated with the machine.
columns.Machine_series: The series or model designation of the machine.
columns.value_points: A numerical value representing the points attributed to the machine for performance evaluation.
columns.quality_rank: A ranking that indicates the quality of the machine, with lower numbers denoting higher quality.

machine.table_description: The machine table holds detailed information about various machines used for racing, including their identification, classification, associated teams, manufacturing year, performance evaluation metrics, and quality rankings.

columns.technician_id: A unique identifier for each technician in the database.
columns.Name: The full name of the technician.
columns.Team: The team with which the technician is affiliated, represented by its abbreviation.
columns.Starting_Year: The year when the technician began their employment.
columns.Age: The current age of the technician.

technician.table_description: The technician table contains information about technicians, including their IDs, names, teams, starting years, and ages.

columns.technician_id: Identifies the technician assigned to perform the repair.
columns.repair_ID: Refers to the specific repair job that has been assigned.
columns.Machine_ID: Indicates the machine that requires repair.

repair_assignment.table_description: The table 'repair_assignment' tracks the assignments of technicians to specific repair jobs on machines, linking technicians, repairs, and machines together.
